Charged with a powerful blend of hydrating active ingredients, it boosts moisture levels whilst Polyhydroxy Therapy (PHA) helps to protect the natural skin barrier. This transformational skin treatment is dermatologist approved and clinically proven to significantly increase moisture levels in the skin for up to 12 hours. Feeling purified and replenished, your skin looks fresher and brighter. The complex gets its name from - La: Lactic Acid - the hero ingredient in all Ameliorate formulas because of its transformative power H: Hydration complex formula 6: Six active ingredients: Lactic Acid, Urea, Sodium Lactate, Serine, Allantoin, Hydrolysed Milk Protein. Other active ingredients: Biohoney Acids - Rich in PHA to give gentle but effective exfoliation Prickly Pear Extract - sooths dry, sensitive and inflamed skin Cotton Seed Oil - helps reduce redness and dry skin Shea Butter - protects skin barrier Cocoa Butter - intensely moisturises *12hr Moisturisation Study Completed on 18 healthy female subjects. **Tested on 101 people with dry to very dry skin with dry rough patches in a 2-week independent consumer trial.

product_details: Vaseline Intensive Care Aloe Soothe Body Lotion combines healing micro-droplets of Vaseline Jelly with aloe vera, known to calm and soothe the skin. The result is a refreshing, fast-absorbing lotion that reduces the discomfort associated with dry, irritated skin, and leaves it feeling deeply moisturised and rejuvenated. Our Intensive Care Aloe Soothe Body Lotion is clinically proven to moisturise deeply* to soothe dry skin with the first application, and to keep it restored for 3 weeks**. Our skin is the barrier between our bodies and the outside world, and the health of our skin is essential to our overall well-being. At Vaseline, we believe that healthy skin starts with deep-restoring moisture, which is why our lotion's formula works to heal and soothe dry skin. The micro-droplets of Vaseline Jelly penetrate deep down within the stratum corneum to lock in moisture and form a protective layer on your skin. This sealing barrier speeds up the skin’s natural recovery process. Apply Vaseline Intensive Care Aloe Soothe Body Lotion daily, letting its rich yet quick-absorbing formula provide intense moisturisation to your skin and leave it delicately fragranced with a fresh aloe vera scent. *based on 4-week treatment clinical study **within the stratum corneum

product_details: Here’s to putting Sally on a pedestal - that’s Skingredients Sally Cleanse (100ml), our multi-award-winning, 2% salicylic acid treatment cleanser that moonlights as a spot-zapper + micro-mask on the side. Salicylic acid is an oil-soluble beta-hydroxy acid (BHA) that deep dives into pores to dissolve the sebum (aka oil), + dead skin cells, which helps to tackle spots, blackheads, lumps + bumps. It’ll effectively exfoliate the skin’s surface for instantly smoother results and help to lift away excess oiliness for a matte finish - it also an anti-inflammatory, which eases redness in the skin. Sally Cleanse is part of our Match + Mix range of skincare. They’re “add-ons” to your Skingredients core recipe - that's the KeyFour - which work to address your individual skin concerns + help you reach your skin goals. Incorporate our Match + Mix products, like Sally Cleanse, into your AM + PM skincare routine when your skin needs it. She’s a powerful ally to oily skinned hoomans, our Sally, but her company is best enjoyed in small doses - that’s every 3rd PM to prevent skin irritation. Her BFF? PreProbiotic Cleanse of course. Use them alongside each other to exfoliate + give back to the skin. Plus, it’s a skin-smoothing hero for bacne, chestne + bumne (be careful around sensitive areas) and keratosis pilaris, aka chicken skin. This product is made for use within the Skingredients Sally Cleanse refillable primary pack only, slotting in easily. It’s skincare that’ll do better by your skin + the planet! Rock Star Ingredients: Salicylic acid: a beta-hydroxy acid (BHA) that dissolves oil and debris in the pore and exfoliates the skin Product Claims: Dermatologically tested Ocular tested Suitable for all skin types Non-comedogenic Cruelty-free Nerdie tip: Use Sally as a wash-off spot-zapper or as a micro-mask. If you’re oily-skinned or prone to any form of congestion anywhere, whether it be blackheads of keratosis pilaris (chicken skin), Sally is your new best friend.

product_details: Eucerin Hyaluron-Filler Day Cream SPF15 is an anti-ageing cream that counteracts the first signs of ageing in dry skin. product_details: Skingredients NEW AHA! Cleanse (100ml) is an active cleanser and micro-mask that contains 8% lactic acid and 1% PHA, which work in harmony to brighten, exfoliate, hydrate and plump the skin. Part of the Skingredients Match + Mix range, use AHA Cleanse 2 to 3 times a week, alternating with PreProbiotic Cleanse, for luminous, glowing skin. Lactic acid is an alpha-hydroxy acid that exfoliates the skin by gently loosening and sweeping away dead skin cells from the skin’s surface. This cleanser promotes smooth, even skin and increases the rate of skin cell turnover. Exfoliating yet importantly also hydrating, our nerdie panellists have been loving the instant glowing results whilst not over-exfoliating the skin. Found your favourite new way to GLOW? Make sure you keep your primary pack and switch to buying a refill tube next time. This Primary Pack tube is your tube-for-life that’s made from resilient, ultra-durable materials. product_details: Skingredients Skin Good Fats (45ml) is your rich moisturiser and night cream, which locks in hydration, while reducing inflammation and irritation. This ceramide barrier balm works by replenishing your skin’s essential fats, vitamins and goodness to bring equilibrium to your skin. Featuring skin-native lipid ceramide NP, shea butter glycerides and grapeseed oil, Skin Good Fats is packed with good fats and a clinically-proven, patented anti-irritation ingredient to stop those itches. We know you’re not surprised that it’s filled with potent antioxidants too, such as niacinamide - vitamin B3 - and vitamin E. This moisturiser is healing, hydrating and anti-inflammatory with a buttery balm texture, making it ideal for those with sensitive or irritated skin, and those using acids or retinols. Found your skincare saviour? Make sure you keep your primary pack and switch to buying a refill tube next time. This Primary Pack tube is your tube-for-life that’s made from resilient, ultra-durable materials. Rock Star Ingredients: Ceramide NP: a skin-native lipid that helps improve the skin barrier function Shea butter glycerides: a moisturising ingredient derived from shea butter fatty acids Avena sativa (oat) kernel extract: a clinically-proven anti-irritant with antihistamine properties Vitis vinifera (grape) seed oil: a moisturising oil with antioxidant properties Niacinamide (vitamin B3) and vitamin E: potent antioxidants to fight free radical damage Product Claims: Dermatologically tested Tested for use around the eyes Tested on dry + dehydrated skin Non-comedogenic Cruelty-free Fragrance-free Suitable for mamas-to-be (suitable for use during pregnancy) Nerdie tip: Apply to any particularly dry areas of skin, around elbows, knees, etc! For extra hydration apply Skin Good Fats for 20 minutes and remove thoroughly for a comforting, soothing micro-mask.

product_details: Skingredients Skin Veg (45ml) is your super juice hydrating + brightening serum that’s powered by fruit + veg extracts galore to tick off your skin’s 5-a-day. Expect instant hydration station with long-term benefits (hello brighter + plumper skin!) after your skin (eye area included!) slurps up Skin Veg’s replenishing recipe. It’s enriched with hyaluronic acid, a humectant hero that attracts + retains moisture, a pro-collagen peptide to diminish fine lines + wrinkles, and a polyhydroxy acid (PHA) to assist deeper penetration of the serums that follow. That’s all combined with fruit, veg + botanical extracts to arm skin with an antioxidant defence, which counteracts the harmful effects of free radicals. Veg + fruit you ask? Turns out our body and skin are pretty similar - they both require protein, good fats, vegetables + fruit to source the amino acids, vitamins and essential fatty acids needed to function at their best. We added PHA to the mix, a second-generation alpha-hydroxy acid (AHA), for a dash of exfoliation that’s gentle enough for every day. Our ultra-lightweight + skin-soothing Skin Veg is the 02 in our KeyFour regime. A hydrating, brightening pre-serum + penetrant enhancer that helps your rock star ingredients sing, it’s suitable for all hoomans in the AM + PM. A face, neck + eye serum in one, apply from the nipples up or mix a healthy dose into your foundation to reveal instant skin luminosity - ooh-la-la! After falling in love with Skin Veg and using every last pump, keep your primary pack and switch to buying a refill tube next time. This Primary Pack tube is your tube-for-life that’s made from resilient, ultra-durable materials. Rock star ingredients: Clinically-proven pro-collagen peptide: reduces the depth + appearance of fine lines, wrinkles + “drinkles” (aka wrinkles caused by dehydration) Sodium hyaluronate: low molecular weight hyaluronic acid to instantly + deeply hydrate the skin Gluconolactone: a PHA (polyhydroxy acid) to assist subsequent product absorption + gently exfoliate the skin for rock star ingredients to show their true talents Fruit + veg extracts: soothing, nourishing + antioxidant in nature - the skin is an organ ® and should be treated as such Liquorice root extract: a brightening botanical ingredient + antioxidant Claims: Dermatologically tested Tested for use around eyes - a moisture surge for the dehydrated eye area Suitable for all hoomans® + all skin types Suitable for mamas-to-be (suitable for use during pregnancy) Cruelty-free Fragrance-free - because smells don’t change cells® Nerdie tip: Skin Veg is adored by make-up artists, so for a shot of runway elegance, apply pre-makeup for a gorgeous, dewy priming effect with long-term skin benefits

product_details: ALREADY HAVE THE PRE-SHOW GLOW REUSABLE APPLICATOR? THIS IS ITS ACCOMPANYING TREATMENT REFILL. GIVE IT TO ME QUICK: Rihanna’s secret for smooth, glowing skin starts with Pre-Show Glow and its reusable applicator. The key to glowing skin is exfoliation-the gentle removal of old, dull cells on the surface of skin. This powerful duo helps transform skin by smoothing and refining the look of pores, while brightening and evening texture over time. KEY BENEFITS: This concentrated formula is packed with 10% AHAs, which provide chemical exfoliation to loosen and lift dead skin cell build-up from the skin’s surface The unique reusable applicator delivers gentle physical exfoliation Its gentle formula leaves skin ultra-soft, radiant, and makeup-ready-with no downtime, right at home A potent combination of fruit enzymes and extracts helps clarify, purify, and smooth Features a light, fruity-floral scent inspired by pomegranate and hibiscus HOW TO USE: Wet reusable applicator and your face with water. Pour a small amount of solution into the centre of the wet applicator. Gently scrub face with the applicator for 30-60 seconds, working the solution into a plush lather. Rinse skin, pat dry, then follow with toner. If using during the day, make sure to follow up with Fenty Skin Hydra Vizor to protect your skin from the sun as AHAs can increase UV sensitivity. For best results, use Pre-Show Glow twice a week with the included applicator. Those with sensitive skin may want to start by applying with fingers or use once a week. Side note-you’ll want to wash the included applicator. Just toss it in your washing machine with the rest of your laundry, making sure to place it in a delicates bag. Use cool water on a gentle cycle. Lay flat to air dry (do not stretch). MADE WITH: 10% AHAs: Glycolic acid, citric acid, and lactic acid help fade the look of dark spots and reduce the look of pores, while improving the skin’s moisture content. Rooibos: Rich in AHAs and zinc; revitalizes and renews Pomegranate, Papaya, & Cranberry enzymes: Help digest, lift, and loosen damaged surface cells Barbados Cherry (acerola) & Hibiscus extracts: Rich in vitamin C; help to clarify and purify WHY PRE-SHOW GLOW IS MOST WANTED: Clean, vegan, gluten-free, & earth-conscious. Its protective outer box is recyclable. The bottle and cap are recyclable. When you’re done, rinse the bottle, separate the bottle and cap, and recycle both. The reusable applicator is made of 80% plant fibres and is machine-washable HAZARDS AND CAUTIONS: For external use only. Use as directed. This product contains active ingredients; we suggest patch-testing a small amount on forearm. Sunburn alert: this product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product for a week afterwards. Avoid eye area. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately.

product_details: Just as everyone's skin is different, skin dryness can appear differently for everyone. From mild, occasionally dry skin driven by ageing, weather fluctuations or just life! To dry patches and skin dryness, Dove has got you covered. Dove Advanced Care Nourishing Silk body wash transforms even the driest skin in just one shower leaving you with silky-soft skin for 24hrs. Unlike ordinary body washes, Dove Advanced Care is made with 24hour Renewing MicroMoisture. A ground-breaking new technology from Dove that deposits millions of tiny but powerfully moisturising droplets that, instead of getting washed off, absorb deeply and continuously work with your skin's natural renewal process to strengthen your skin's barrier and help retain and boost moisture, even after you shower. This moisturising body wash helps you turn every shower into an act of self-care, giving you 24hours of replenished, silky-soft skin. This formula uses a blend of naturally-derived mild cleansers and skin natural nourishers to gently cleanse your skin and nourish your microbiome. It's also is free from sulfate SLES, has 94%* biodegradable ingredients and is packaged in 100% recycled plastic bottles**. *94% of ingredients break down into carbon dioxide, water & minerals (OECD test methods 301,302 and/or 310). **bottle excluding cap and labels"

brand: Dr.Jart+ Cicapair Intensive Soothing Repair Gel Cream 50ml
product_details: For skin that has no chill. This soft gel cream is enriched with Centella Asiatica and Peptides. It instantly helps skin feel cool with soothing hydration, reduces the look of redness and rapidly strengthens skin’s barrier for more resilient skin. Suitable for sensitive skin. Dermatologist tested. Results: Reduces the look of redness Provides soothing hydration Strengthens skin’s barrier for more resilient skin What makes it unique: Our next-generation gel cream now comes turbocharged with innovative skin-tech from Korea. Powerhouse ingredient Centella Asiatica is levelled up via CoolSonic, a technology which breaks Cica extract down into smaller particles via ultra sonic waves in a cool environment to allow for better skin absorption. The lightweight, non-sticky formula cools skin with soothing hydration, leaving it looking calm, and building skin’s resilience to external aggressors. Great for all skin types, including those with oily skin. What’s in it: Centella Asiatica Extract, that is wild harvested, soothes to reduce the look of redness. Peptide R-Protecter delivers more soothing power. Allantoin rapidly boosts skin’s barrier to improve resilience. Free from: Synthetic fragrance Mineral Oil Alcohol Concern Sensitised-looking skin Redness Compromised skin barrier Ingredients Centella Asiatica Extracts Peptide R-Protector Allantoin Result Instantly soothes Boosts skin’s barrier Improves resilience EDUTAIN CONTENT SECTION Why CoolSonic Technology? This enhanced delivery system cools a part of the Centella Asiatica Extract and breaks it into smaller particles for better absorption into skin. 3 Potent Ingredients. Centella Asiatica Extracts (a new Advanced Cica Complex) and Peptide R-Protector deliver intensive soothing. Allantoin rapidly strengthens skin’s barrier. The Skin-a-gram. Take a virtual look inside skin to see how Cicapair™ delivers instant results. TEXTURE Get a feel for it. Soft, ultra-lightweight cooling gel cream absorbs into skin without a sticky feeling - the ideal texture for oily skin and suitable for sensitive skin.

product_details: The Rich Emulsion is a concentrate of technologies that hydrates the skin durably, prevents and corrects the first visible signs of ageing. Being better preserved on a daily basis, the quality of the skin looks better and and more glowing with radiance. The creamy formula is composed of 95% ingredients of natural origin. It is enriched with Japanese camellia oil, which is particularly suitable for skin in need of comforting and nourishing moisture.AQUACOMPLEX ADVANCEDThis combination of ingredients helps to stimulate the skin's natural hydration mechanisms by enhancing the response of a protein that can adapt and respond to water stress (NFAT5)². This complex improves the skin's seal and ensures its ability to rehydrate itself.AQUABIOTIC SYSTEMThis technology targets the skin's ecosystem to keep skin healthy and improve its quality.In accordance with ISO 16128. The remaining 5% help to optimise the formula's integrity over time and its sensory qualities.In vitro test on ingredients.Scientifically TestedINTENSIVE HYDRATING PERFORMANCEFROM THE FIRST APPLICATION: Hydration1: +67% after 24 hours Wrinkles appear to be reduced2: -23%AFTER SEVEN DAYS THE PANELISTS NOTICE3:Skin's beauty: +12%Nourished appearance of the skin: +24%Luminosity: +19%AFTER FOUR WEEKS4:Radiance: +3%Evenness of the complexion: +25%Refined skin texture: +22%

product_details: An instant and “needle-free” solution for tired and puffy-looking eyes. These biodegradable hydrogel patches use acetyl hexapeptide-8 to give a smoothing effect by reducing the look of fine lines. Niacinamide and soothing plant extracts help to depuff and brighten, giving a refreshed appearance.

product_details: The CALMELLIA Multi Relief SOS Balm is a multi-purpose and rescue balm infused with Japanese Camellia oil for the face, hair and body. Formulated with Vegetal oil shield, a blend of 4 botanical oils* that mimics skin’s own natural lipid composition, it forms a protective veil that hydrates and nourishes all dry and damaged areas. **Botanical oils: camellia, squalane, jojoba, eucalyptus Why is it special? • Certified clean, vegan balm with only 8 carefully selected ingredients • Enriched with a special blend of 4 botanical oils, including Japanese camellia oil, for intense hydration and nourishment. • Can be applied anywhere and anytime (face, hands, lips, heels, cuticles, eye area, elbows, etc.) for quick relief of damaged skin. • A high-quality, stable formula made from just 4 supporting ingredients** **Botanical oils: camellia, squalane, jojoba, eucalyptus A UNIQUE COMPOSITION OF STAR INGREDIENTS Goto Islands camellia seed oil: Rich in oleic acid, this precious Japanese oil is very similar to the fatty acids found naturally in the skin and is used by SHISEIDO in his WASO Calmellia Multi Relief SOS Balm for its amazing benefits for skin and hair. Acts as an emollient to moisturize the skin, protecting hair fibers from damage while enhancing hair's natural shine. Botanical squalane oil: Squalane mimics squalene, which is naturally biosynthesized in the body, and is an important component of human sebum, so it has an incredible affinity for skin. Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil: Known for its aromatherapy properties. Jojoba seed oil: Jojoba oil is a powerful emollient that moisturizes and mimics the wax esters found in the skin's protective hydrolipid film. Four supporting components: Tocopherol This natural form of Vitamin E prevents ingredients from oxidizing and keeps the formula fresh. Dextrin palmitate This plant-based compound acts as a natural thickener that adjusts the texture of the oil in your formula. Triisostearin This is the only ingredient that is not naturally derived and is a blend of glycerin and the fatty acid stearic acid. It improves the texture of the balm and gives it a rich, smooth feel. Zea Mays Starch This ingredient naturally derived from corn gives the balm a smooth texture and a non-greasy finish. Small but strong! • Clinically Proven 8-Hour Continuous Hydration(1) • Up to 47% improvement in roughness on multiple areas (face, hands, lips, heels, cuticles) in just 3 hours(2) Proven to improve hair shine by 30% (3) and extend hair moisture for 4 hours (3). • 93% improvement in rough skin in 4 weeks Apply and nourish! It can be applied anywhere and anytime (face, hands, lips, heels, cuticles, eye area, elbows, etc.) for quick relief of damaged skin. Taking care of the environment is also your priority A clean formula: This 90% natural origin* balm is a minimalist formula with only 8 ingredients carefully selected for their skin benefits. * calculated based on the ISO16128 standard. Environmentally friendly packaging: The packaging material was carefully selected. Plastic-free packaging thanks to aluminium packages and cases made from paper from sustainably managed forests. Vegan Formula: Formulated without animal-derived/animal-derived ingredients and in line with Shiseido's Animal Welfare Policy. Waterless formula: Developed with environmental consciousness, with a water-free formula.

product_details: Skingredients Skin Veg (45ml) is your super juice hydrating + brightening serum that’s powered by fruit + veg extracts galore to tick off your skin’s 5-a-day. Expect instant hydration station with long-term benefits (hello brighter + plumper skin!) after your skin (eye area included!) slurps up Skin Veg’s replenishing recipe. It’s enriched with hyaluronic acid, a humectant hero that attracts + retains moisture, a pro-collagen peptide to diminish fine lines + wrinkles, and a polyhydroxy acid (PHA) to assist deeper penetration of the serums that follow. That’s all combined with fruit, veg + botanical extracts to arm skin with an antioxidant defence, which counteracts the harmful effects of free radicals. Veg + fruit you ask? Turns out our body and skin are pretty similar - they both require protein, good fats, vegetables + fruit to source the amino acids, vitamins and essential fatty acids needed to function at their best. We added PHA to the mix, a second-generation alpha-hydroxy acid (AHA), for a dash of exfoliation that’s gentle enough for every day. Our ultra-lightweight + skin-soothing Skin Veg is the 02 in our KeyFour regime. A hydrating, brightening pre-serum + penetrant enhancer that helps your rock star ingredients sing, it’s suitable for all hoomans in the AM + PM. A face, neck + eye serum in one, apply from the nipples up or mix a healthy dose into your foundation to reveal instant skin luminosity - ooh-la-la! This product is made for use within the Skingredients Skin Veg primary pack only, slotting in easily. It’s skincare that’ll do better by your skin + the planet! Rock star ingredients: Clinically-proven pro-collagen peptide: reduces the depth + appearance of fine lines, wrinkles + “drinkles” (aka wrinkles caused by dehydration) Sodium hyaluronate: low molecular weight hyaluronic acid to instantly + deeply hydrate the skin Gluconolactone: a PHA (polyhydroxy acid) to assist subsequent product absorption + gently exfoliate the skin for rock star ingredients to show their true talents Fruit + veg extracts: soothing, nourishing + antioxidant in nature - the skin is an organ and should be treated as such Liquorice root extract: a brightening botanical ingredient + antioxidant Claims: Dermatologically tested Tested for use around eyes - a moisture surge for the dehydrated eye area Suitable for all hoomans® + all skin types Suitable for mamas-to-be (suitable for use during pregnancy) Cruelty-free Fragrance-free - because smells don’t change cells Nerdie tip: Skin Veg is adored by make-up artists, so for a shot of runway elegance, apply pre-makeup for a gorgeous, dewy priming effect with long-term skin benefits.

product_details: Get Caribbean skin straight from your shower. These mini essentials are the perfect pair, giving you everything you need for smooth, hydrated, and glowing skin just in time for that hot getaway. BUFF THE ROUGH Give your skin the Barbados beach treatment all year round with Buff Ryder Exfoliating Body Scrub with Superfine Sand + Fruit Enzymes. Sugar, salt, and superfine sand form a gentle, but effective, exfoliating emulsion, while decadent oils deeply nourish and soften. Your skin is left feeling smooth, polished, and pampered—straight from the shower. Plus, it features a warm, deliciously tropical scent reminiscent of caramel and guava. DRIP SKIN IN A HYDRATING GLOSSY SHEEN Take your body moisturizer to the luxe level with Butta Drop Whipped Oil Body Cream with Tropical Oils + Shea Butter. Butta up your body with this deliciously whipped oil body cream loaded with tropical oils, butters, and extracts. Revel in the long-lasting hydration and non-sticky gleam. Plus, it features our clean, fresh scent inspired by lush tropical fruits and flowers.
